summary:
FOR MALE CHARACTERS ONLY
It replaces the one-handed and the two-handed sword, positioning on back like The Witcher 2/3
descriptionHtml:
[u]Intro[/u]:
I always have been looking for a mod like this, so... after 30 minutes learning to use Nifskope, i changed the weapon position to look like Geralt's Twin Swords, i put the One-handed sword to the right and the Two-handed to the left, i've putted like this to fit like Witcher 2, longsword to the left, silver(one-handed) to the right.

[u]Installation[/u]:
Install it with [i]Nexus Mod Manager[/i] C:
or just unzip the file in the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.

[b][i][u]Requirements[/u][/i][/b]:
-Realistic ragdolls and force - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?

[i][u][b]Known issues/incompatibilities[/b][/u][/i]:
-The weapons may clip with big a armor, and with the slim ones they will look like they're flying around.

-This is incompatible with XPMS (im working on it)

PD: If you want to see twin swords and other weapon at the same time you NEED: EQUIPPING OVERHAUL mod(recommended!)

this is only a weapon position change.

[b][i][u]Mods used in screenshots:
[/u][/i][/b]-Witcher 2 models (Seltkirk set) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5588/?

-ApachiiSkyhair (Geralt hair) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

-ApachiiSkyhair HDT extention - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47000/?

-HDT plugin - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?

-HDT equipment - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57408/?

-Regent Swords (the longsword on the leftside)- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17250/?

-Kimono's Witcher silver sword (the best witcher silver sword you'll find) - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16991/?
author: Kuliator
